steps: Gently melt the butter with the dark chocolate. Stir in the flour, chestnuts, cocoa, sugar, eggs and vanilla essence.
Turn into a lightly greased 1.2L/2pt pudding basin. Cover with a circle of baking parchment and foil. Secure the top with string and make a string handle from one side of the basin to another.
Steam for 2½ hours. Insert a skewer into the pudding to make sure it is cooked. Turn out of the dish and serve with cream or vanilla ice cream.
title: Chocolate and chestnut pudding
